TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEntityWithKey

Docs.summary: Defines an entity type that exposes an entity key.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This interface is used to expose the entity key to Object Services.
Object Services uses the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithKey.EntityKey%2A> property to manage objects in the object context.
For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0) and [Tracking Changes in POCO Entities](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Data::EntityKey ^ EntityKey { System::Data::EntityKey ^ get(); void set(System::Data::EntityKey ^ value); };
member this.EntityKey : System.Data.EntityKey with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the for instances of entity types that implement this interface.
